integration_removed.title: The Zengge integration has been removed
integration_removed.description:
The Zengge integration has been removed from Home Assistant. Support for Zengge lights is provided by the `led_ble` integration.

To resolve this issue, please remove the (now defunct) `zengge` light configuration from your Home Assistant configuration and [configure the `led_ble` integration]({led_ble_url}).
